121211.content:
Let's start with a family:

Joshua is a human, 18-year-old boy who has finally graduated from High School and plans to take it easy for a year before he moves on to university. In the meantime, he lives with his father, Eric and foxy mother, Danielle. Foxy mother...in a literal sense.

Ever since the existence of anthros and eventual coexistence, there was found to be a lot fo biological compatibility than thought before. In a way, anthros are just another form of humans. As such, it was possible for even anthros and humans to copulate.

That's exactly what happened with Eric and Danielle who found love with each other, then gave birth to their only son Joshua. Giving birth to a human is actually a hard requirement given the traditional 30% chance of turning out a furless being, but Danielle who had a human father provided a higher chance in her genes.

Regardless of how Joshua turned out, Danielle loved him dearly. To her, she only wanted the best and dotted on him excessively. Despite being 18 now, she has kept the same focus on her son as she has when he was a baby, with ferociously protective eyes. Today, that has left Joshua time to discover the lengths his mother will go to keep her foul close and whether he wants to leave for university at all.
121211.title: Fox

choices: Only Danielle. Eric had left for work.
Both your mother and father were at the table.
1212111.content:
"Baby, it's time to wake up."

A soft silky hand brushed through your cheek. You groan and slowly open your eyes, seeing your mother, Danielle staring over you with her maternal velvet eyes, wiggling nuzzle, and lavish red hair that matched her orange fur. You are stunned to see her waking you up in her nightgown that was partially see-through. Her chest was large enough to envelop your hands and you are reminded how those babies fed you when you were little.

Not wanting to be caught staring, you shake your head and sit upright, avoiding eye-contact with your fur-mother.

"I'm up, I'm up!"

Danielle chuckles, pulling back. "Glad to see it, my sweet foul. Just because you no longer have to worry about school doesn't mean you can laze around, okay?"

"R-right," you answered, embarrassed, still avoiding eye-contact with your mother.

Danielle was a little saddened by her son's lack of attention, but she figured it was due to him still half-asleep. She leaned closer and gave a long kiss on his cheek. You flinch, especially as you feel a little of her tongue licking your face.

"I'll get breakfast ready okay? Then, we'll talk about our plans now that you have plenty of time off."

You nod and stare at your mother as she turns away, her swaying hips making you a little dizzy and causing you to have to look down and refocus.

"Damn it," you curse quietly, "I may go crazy."

This wasn't the first time your mother woke you up. In fact, every morning she comes to give you some kind of morning kiss and hug. Sometimes, she even slips into your bed and snuggles with you!

You decided against thinking on it any longer and then wonder what kind of plans she was talking about. You sigh and let it drop for now, reluctantly pulling out of bed to get ready and changed.

Arriving into the kitchen, who did you see?
1212111.title: A Foxy Awakening

12123.content:
Since you are a furry what is your species, and for the secondly you have a mixed family. Maybe you have a mixed genes, or just your have mixed family? You must decide if you are pure breed or mixed breed.

Pure breed have a parents from the same species and genus (Fox-Fox, Wolf-Wolf)

Cross breed have the parents form the same species but not the same race (Brown Bear-Polar Bear, Fox-Arctic Fox)

Mixed breed have a parents form different species and race (Lion-Tiger, Fox-Wolf)

Or you can go Extremely (Lioness-Zebra, Orca-Shark)

Use your imagination buddy.
